name: Super Ninja Jump 200
description:
In a land ravished by the Red Demon and his underlings, few warriors dare oppose the status quo. Yet legend states two hundred leaps from a bamboo shoot will draw the tyrants out and hinder them vulnerable to the undivine. All those who have attempted this feat have vanished... Today a new hero rises to face the challenge...

                                                                               

Take control of the unnamed Ninja as he leaps from bamboo, slays demons and attempts to bring tranquillity back his homeland.

Enjoy a short but challenging game  that only requires the arrow keys to play.

Written and Created by

Duck Tin Games

Pixel Art by

ghost_fish

m5x7 Font by

Daniel Linssen

                                                                                    

Move Arrow KeysQuit Esc
